page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This block comprises a rural area of the{Lower Culm Valley}and includes the village of{Uffculme.}The river{Culm} runs through the centre and the main land use is for grazing of cattle and sheep. There are also two areas of quarry land which are owned by{E.C.C. Quarries Ltd.}These provide considerable local employment and they also own much of the land adjacent to the existing quarry areas. There are also several light industries in the area and these are mentioned in some detail later.{Uffculme}itself is undergoing considerable growth at present. There is a fairly high proportion of council housing but the most recent growth has been of small private estates. With the{M5 motorway and{North Devon Link Road}nearby many people commute and this may increase when{Tiverton Parkway}opens in 1987.
